message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a decent profit. How about we try $130?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a good fit for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $130, Bob. That's my bottom line. I'm willing to meet you at $130, but I won't go any lower.
